conjurer:Genesis.NAME: Genesis
DESCRIPTION: Summon cards are relegated to the {Control Pile}, where they can be Summoned for free. The total cost of Summons current active cannot exceed your total Energy. If a Summon is killed, it is removed from your deck. If a Summon is Withdrawn, it will not be Triggered and will not go into your discard pile.

conjurer:Trinity.NAME: Trinity
DESCRIPTION: You can encounter cards and relics from {The Ironclad}, {The Silent}, and {The Defect}.
